component.name: ArdorQuery
component.description: ArdorQuery is a UI tool for performing any HTTP(S) endpoints like REST API, HTML, Images, GraphQL, OData etc. Similar to cURL and Postman. The main goal is to make an application with minimal user interface and keyboard oriented.

description.p: Save all opened queries on close application to user profile and restore queries after start application.
Show query status icon in Queries list.
Scroll to selected item in History list.
Added new timeout field to configure the transfer timeout in milliseconds.
Added a new order field to customize the execution multiple queries sequence.
Fixed file name detection in Content-Disposition header.
Support ordering (based on value in order field) in run miltiple queries.
